StarbaseModule.Name: Starbase Hull Repair Kit
StarbaseModule.Description: Provides the raw materials and energy source to repair damage to the starbase.

StarbaseModule.Name: Repair System
StarbaseModule.Description: Increases the speed at which ships repair within the area of the starbase.

StarbaseModule.Name: Battle Stations
StarbaseModule.Description: Basic battle module needed for adding weapons and defenses to aid the starbase and nearby ships.

StarbaseModule.Name: Battle Stations Mark II
StarbaseModule.Description: Improves the Offensive Capabilities of the Starbase.

StarbaseModule.Name: Battle Stations Mark III
StarbaseModule.Description: Adds Advanced Offensive Capabilities to the Starbase.

StarbaseModule.Name: Battle Stations Mark IV
StarbaseModule.Description: Adds Advanced Offensive Capabilities to the Starbase.

StarbaseModule.Name: Devastation Beam
StarbaseModule.Description: Improves the Starbases' offensive Beam weapon capabilities.

StarbaseModule.Name: Matter Detonators
StarbaseModule.Description: Improves the Starbases' offensive Missile weapon capabilities.

StarbaseModule.Name: Atlas Sling
StarbaseModule.Description: Improves the Starbases' offensive Mass-Drive capabilities.

StarbaseModule.Name: Invulnerability Bloom
StarbaseModule.Description: Overlord-class Beam attacks don't stand a chance against these shields!

StarbaseModule.Name: Electro-Magnetic Surge
StarbaseModule.Description: Your best line of defense against an Overlord-class Missile attack.

StarbaseModule.Name: Overlord Armor
StarbaseModule.Description: Built to withstand Mass-Driver attacks from Overlord-class battleships.

StarbaseModule.Name: Subspace Blaster
StarbaseModule.Description: Big powerful beam weapon to blast our enemies.

StarbaseModule.Name: Star Javelin
StarbaseModule.Description: A star-based size missile system to wipe out enemy ships who dare attack.

StarbaseModule.Name: Ship Pounder
StarbaseModule.Description: Big, bulky but lethal high speed mass driver weapon to destroy enemy ships.

StarbaseModule.Name: Ray-Shielding
StarbaseModule.Description: Vector based moduled shields prevent many types of beam weapons from getting through.

StarbaseModule.Name: Missile Defender
StarbaseModule.Description: The Missile Defender series of starbase defense are quite effective at stopping rampaging missiles.

StarbaseModule.Name: Combat Armor
StarbaseModule.Description: Advanced armor design built to withstand most projectile based weaponry.

StarbaseModule.Name: Annihilator
StarbaseModule.Description: Improves the Starbases' offensive Beam weapon capabilities.

StarbaseModule.Name: Shredder
StarbaseModule.Description: Improves the Starbases' offensive Beam weapon capabilities.

StarbaseModule.Name: Singularity Weapon
StarbaseModule.Description: Advanced weapons to ensure, that our starbases are untouchable.

StarbaseModule.Name: Multiplier Field
StarbaseModule.Description: Enables nearby friendly ships to use vast stored energies of the starbase to increase their weapon damage.

StarbaseModule.Name: Multiplier Field II
StarbaseModule.Description: Enables nearby friendly ships to use vast stored energies of the starbase to increase their weapon damage.

StarbaseModule.Name: Multiplier Field III
StarbaseModule.Description: Enables nearby friendly ships to use vast stored energies of the starbase to increase their weapon damage.

StarbaseModule.Name: Multiplier Field IV
StarbaseModule.Description: Enables nearby friendly ships to use vast stored energies of the starbase to increase their weapon damage.

StarbaseModule.Name: Multiplier Field V
StarbaseModule.Description: Enables nearby friendly ships to use vast stored energies of the starbase to increase their weapon damage.

StarbaseModule.Name: Multiplier Field VI
StarbaseModule.Description: Enables nearby friendly ships to use vast stored energies of the starbase to increase their weapon damage.

StarbaseModule.Name: Defense Jammer
StarbaseModule.Description: Sends out subspace pulse to disrupt enemy defense grids.

StarbaseModule.Name: Subspace Weapons
StarbaseModule.Description: Gathers energy from nearby stars and projects it to power the weapons of friendly ships.

StarbaseModule.Name: Protection Fields
StarbaseModule.Description: These shields will protects ships in the area from enemy attacks.

StarbaseModule.Name: Protection Field II
StarbaseModule.Description: This field will protect ships in the area from enemy attacks.

StarbaseModule.Name: Protection Field III
StarbaseModule.Description: This field will protect ships in the area from enemy attacks.

StarbaseModule.Name: Protection Field IV
StarbaseModule.Description: This field will protect ships in the area from enemy attacks.

StarbaseModule.Name: Protection Field V
StarbaseModule.Description: This field will protect ships in the area from enemy attacks.

StarbaseModule.Name: Protection Field VI
StarbaseModule.Description: This field will protect ships in the area from enemy attacks.

StarbaseModule.Name: Subspace Shields
StarbaseModule.Description: Gathers energy from nearby stars and projects it as a protective shield over friendly ships.

StarbaseModule.Name: Stellar Wake
StarbaseModule.Description: Enhancing the Starbase's gyroscopic core will slightly boost the Speed of ships.

StarbaseModule.Name: Inverse Tractor Beam
StarbaseModule.Description: Low-Level Inverse Tractor beams will give ships in the sector a small boost.

StarbaseModule.Name: HyperField
StarbaseModule.Description: Magnifies the subspace field of nearby ships increasing their speed.

StarbaseModule.Name: Phase Lane Accelerator
StarbaseModule.Description: Spies out phase lanes and moves ships along them to speed them up.

StarbaseModule.Name: Interdiction Beam
StarbaseModule.Description: By equipping the base with weak tractor beams we can slow down the enemy.

StarbaseModule.Name: Warp Field Disruptor
StarbaseModule.Description: By disrupting the warp field, foreign ships are slowed down when entering the effective area.

StarbaseModule.Name: Interstellar Embassy
StarbaseModule.Description: A location where questions or comments can be placed about your civilization.

StarbaseModule.Name: Interstellar Consortium
StarbaseModule.Description: Help other civilizations in this sector and in nearby sectors start franchises that push our products and culture.

StarbaseModule.Name: Franchise Center
StarbaseModule.Description: Spread our culture to nearby sectors more effectively by helping bring our products to their people.

StarbaseModule.Name: Franchise Headquarters
StarbaseModule.Description: Spread our culture to nearby sectors more effectively by helping bring our products to their people.

StarbaseModule.Name: Cultural Maximization Center
StarbaseModule.Description: A huge round the clock expo featuring the best of our culture.

StarbaseModule.Name: Insurrection Coordinator
StarbaseModule.Description: Coordinate covert attempts to subvert native governments of nearby planets.

StarbaseModule.Name: Cultural Conquest Center
StarbaseModule.Description: Coordinate covert attempts to subvert native governments of nearby planets.

StarbaseModule.Name: Cultural Supremacy
StarbaseModule.Description: Demonstrate our utter supremacy and make planets' citizens an offer they can't refuse.

StarbaseModule.Name: Imperium
StarbaseModule.Description: A location where questions or comments can be placed about your civilization.

StarbaseModule.Name: Missionary Support
StarbaseModule.Description: Supports our Missionaries to spread our influence into the universe.

StarbaseModule.Name: Kryniac Conversion Temple
StarbaseModule.Description: Allows us to train non-Krynn into becoming Disciples of Krynn.

StarbaseModule.Name: Kryniac Disciple Chamber
StarbaseModule.Description: Trains converts into becoming disciples to go and spread The Way.

StarbaseModule.Name: Utopian Society
StarbaseModule.Description: A place where beings can meet and discover the wonders of our culture.

StarbaseModule.Name: Xeno Influence Module
StarbaseModule.Description: Appeals to a broad range of species to win them over to our side.

StarbaseModule.Name: Starbase Factory
StarbaseModule.Description: Takes nearby asteroids and other debris and converts them into manufacturing materials that are sent to nearby planets for processing.

StarbaseModule.Name: Adv. Starbase Factory
StarbaseModule.Description: A facility to assist workers on nearby planetary production.

StarbaseModule.Name: Massive Scaling Center
StarbaseModule.Description: Taking advantage of zero gravity, nearby planet resources are turned into manufacturing points much faster.

StarbaseModule.Name: Interstellar Collectors
StarbaseModule.Description: This module allows us to more efficiently handle our resources in a given sector. Production is enhanced.

StarbaseModule.Name: Orbital Replicators
StarbaseModule.Description: Planet side manufacturing in this sector gets a boost thanks to orbital replication.

StarbaseModule.Name: Orbital Slave Pit
StarbaseModule.Description: Use slave labor in space to increase slave labor on planets.

StarbaseModule.Name: Stellar Slave Center
StarbaseModule.Description: More slaves on our starbases equals more production done.

StarbaseModule.Name: Adv. Stellar Slave Center
StarbaseModule.Description: Even more slaves on our starbases equals even more production done.

StarbaseModule.Name: Industrial Replication Center I
StarbaseModule.Description: Takes nearby space debris and converts it into manufacturing materials that are sent to nearby planets for processing.

StarbaseModule.Name: Industrial Replication Center II
StarbaseModule.Description: Takes nearby space debris and converts it into manufacturing materials that are sent to nearby planets for processing.

StarbaseModule.Name: Industrial Replication Center III
StarbaseModule.Description: Takes nearby space debris and converts it into manufacturing materials that are sent to nearby planets for processing.

StarbaseModule.Name: Interstellar Collectors
StarbaseModule.Description: This module allows us to more efficiently handle our resources in a given sector. Production is enhanced.

StarbaseModule.Name: Resource Collector
StarbaseModule.Description: Magnifies production on our nearby planets

StarbaseModule.Name: Smart Drones
StarbaseModule.Description: Small helper bots assist with orbital production for our planets in this sector.

StarbaseModule.Name: Mfg. Vortex Factory
StarbaseModule.Description: Use our Manufactucting Vortex technology in orbit. We should see a slight boost to production.

StarbaseModule.Name: Energy Matrix Center
StarbaseModule.Description: We should see a large boost to production thanks to distributed energy matrix technology.

StarbaseModule.Name: Mining Barracks
StarbaseModule.Description: Basic mining facility. Provides a small bonus to various abilities.

StarbaseModule.Name: Mining Headquarters
StarbaseModule.Description: Artificial Gravity now allows workers greater maneuverability when mining.

StarbaseModule.Name: Resource Excavation
StarbaseModule.Description: Using sophisticated Nano Machines, we can double our resource extraction rate.

StarbaseModule.Name: Extraction Center
StarbaseModule.Description: Bridging mining and science, this is the pinnacle of excavation facilities.

StarbaseModule.Name: Resource Sector
StarbaseModule.Description: The ultimate resource extractor

StarbaseModule.Name: Slave Mining Center
StarbaseModule.Description: Slaves make fantastic miners..

StarbaseModule.Name: Slave Mining Complex
StarbaseModule.Description: Slaves tirelessly mine, and then mine some more.

StarbaseModule.Name: Adv. Slave Mining Complex
StarbaseModule.Description: Slaves tirelessly mine, and then mine some more.

StarbaseModule.Name: Interstellar Mining Refinery
StarbaseModule.Description: Precursor archives provide us the technology for this powerful mining mechanism.

StarbaseModule.Name: Molecular Mining Center
StarbaseModule.Description: Mining at the molecular level.

StarbaseModule.Name: Refinery
StarbaseModule.Description: Allows us extract more from galactic resources.

StarbaseModule.Name: Expert Refinery
StarbaseModule.Description: Allows us extract more from galactic resources.

StarbaseModule.Name: Mfg. Mining Matrix
StarbaseModule.Description: Use massive amounts of cheap power to mine more effectively.

StarbaseModule.Name: Collective Mining I
StarbaseModule.Description: Use collectives to mine more effectively.

StarbaseModule.Name: Collective Mining II
StarbaseModule.Description: Use collectives to mine more effectively.

StarbaseModule.Name: Collective Mining III
StarbaseModule.Description: Use collectives to mine more effectively.

StarbaseModule.Name: Trading Post
StarbaseModule.Description: Increases weekly income of Trade Vessels traveling through this sector.

StarbaseModule.Name: Advanced Trading Post
StarbaseModule.Description: Increases weekly income of Freighters traveling through this sector.

StarbaseModule.Name: Trade Center
StarbaseModule.Description: Increases weekly income of Trade Vessels traveling through this sector.

StarbaseModule.Name: Super Trade Base
StarbaseModule.Description: Increases weekly income of Trade Vessels traveling through this sector.

StarbaseModule.Name: Trade Outpost
StarbaseModule.Description: Increases weekly income of Trade Vessels traveling through this sector.

StarbaseModule.Name: Sector Surveillance Scanners
StarbaseModule.Description: Increases the sensor range of the starbase for surveillance of the surrounding area.

StarbaseModule.Name: Terror Star Foundation
StarbaseModule.Description: Begins the process of creating a Terror Star.

StarbaseModule.Name: Terror Star Command Center
StarbaseModule.Description: Adds the command center to the Terror Star.

StarbaseModule.Name: Terror Star Storage and Barracks
StarbaseModule.Description: Adds the storage and barracks areas to the Terror Star.

StarbaseModule.Name: Terror Star Navigation and Propulsion System
StarbaseModule.Description: Adds the navigational systems and propulsion devices to the Terror Star.

StarbaseModule.Name: Terror Star Death Beam
StarbaseModule.Description: Adds the finishing touch to the Terror Star - the devastating death beam!
